name: Byron Howard
info:
• 别名: Byron P. Howard
  • 别名: バイロン・ハワード
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1968
  • 职业: Animator, Director, Producer and Screenwriter, occasional voice actor
detail: Byron P. Howard (born 1968) is an American animator, film director, producer, screenwriter, story artist and occasional voice actor at Walt Disney Animation Studios, and is best known as the lead character animator on Lilo & Stitch and Brother Bear and co-director of Bolt, Tangled, and Zootopia.
